recipe.title: Tangy Tuna and Sun-Dried Tomato Wrap
ingredients: 2 cans (6 oz each) chunk light tuna in water, drained
instructions: In a bowl, combine tuna, tomatoes, mayonnaise, parsley and capers. Add salt and pepper. Spoon 1/2 tsp mustard on tortilla. Layer lettuce leaf, then add 1/4 tuna mixture on each tortilla, spread to within 1/4 inch of the edges, and roll.
